    Subclasses of Instruction in blf.blockchains.hyperledger.instructions
    Modifier and Type
    Class
    Description
    class 
    HyperledgerBlockFilterInstruction
    This class handles the 'BLOCKS (fromBlock) (toBlock)' filter of the .bcql file.
    class 
    HyperledgerConnectInstruction
    This class provides functionality to connect to a Hyperledger blockchain node.
    class 
    HyperledgerLogEntryFilterInstruction
    HyperledgerLogEntryFilterInstruction is an Instruction for the Hyperledger log extraction mode of the Blockchain Logging Framework.
    class 
    HyperledgerSmartContractFilterInstruction
    HyperledgerSmartContractFilterInstruction is an Instruction for the Hyperledger smart contract mode of the Blockchain Logging Framework.
    class 
    HyperledgerTransactionFilterInstruction
    HyperledgerTransactionFilterInstruction is an Instruction for the Hyperledger log extraction mode of the Blockchain Logging Framework.
